addTrustedSender(address).details: Converts address to bytes32 for storage

params._mailbox: Address of the Hyperlane Mailbox on Base Mainnet                 Must be: 0xeA87ae93Fa0019a82A727bfd3eBd1cFCa8f64f1D

handle(uint32,bytes32,bytes).details: This function can only be called by the Hyperlane MailboxMessages are only accepted from Celo Mainnet (domain 42220)

params._origin: Domain ID of the origin chain
params._sender: Sender address on the origin chain (as bytes32)

returns._0: Local domain identifier (should be 8453 for Base Mainnet)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

enforceTrustedSenders().notice: Whether to enforce trusted senders check

getMessage(bytes32).notice: Get a received message by ID

getMessageAsString(bytes32).notice: Decode a message as a string

isTrustedSender(address).notice: Check if a sender is trusted

isTrustedSenderBytes32(bytes32).notice: Check if a sender is trusted (bytes32 format)

receivedMessages(bytes32).notice: Mapping of message ID to received message

trustedSenders(bytes32).notice: Trusted senders from Celo (optional access control)
